input.sentences: on the streets | we ran into this neat diner .
the owner told us a bit about the establishment .
outside the shop was a bulletin wall with papers .
the doors and furniture were very interesting .
the shop had long windows and was in the city .
output.sentences: It's another day on the city streets outside of O'Rourkes diner.
This is Jack; he has been the proprietor of O'Rourkes since it opened many years ago.
Jack always has the menu and specials posted right outside to entice locals and visitors as well.
Jack takes great pride in O'Rourkes and shows it by keeping the inside and outside clean.
O'Rourkes is a neighborhood institution and if you haven't been yet you should definitely make it a point to go.
